bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1226559 Patch that fixes this bug in my system
Description of problem: Sending a print job to my EPSON XP-432 always crashes epson-escpr resulting in only half page being printed
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 1.5.2-3.1lsb3.2.fc24.x86_64 1.6.10-1.1lsb3.2.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Print any document
Actual results: Half page printed
Expected results: Printing works normally
Additional info: I found a patch from archlinux guys that fixes the bug for me and I'm attaching it
*** Bug 1400367 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
epson-inkjet-printer-escpr-1.6.10-2.1lsb3.2.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-361a1bc333
epson-inkjet-printer-escpr-1.6.10-2.1lsb3.2.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-3f113a5904
epson-inkjet-printer-escpr-1.6.10-2.1lsb3.2.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-d32700fb7e
epson-inkjet-printer-escpr-1.6.10-2.1lsb3.2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-8ed1111325
epson-inkjet-printer-escpr-1.6.10-2.1lsb3.2.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-515949e16d

Thanks for the patch and report. I was almost certain they had fixed this upstream, since the bug had been there for over half a year. Guess I was wrong. No harm no foul, since this was found out in the testing repo...
From what I know that patch didn't make it to upstream and I have no idea how to reach them.
From what I know that patch didn't make it to upstream and I have no idea how to reach them.
